snippet.title: The Walking Dead Onslaught | Official Announcement Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Coming 2020! Wishlist now on Steam: bit.ly/WishistTWDO
Official website: www.TWDOnslaught.com

Fight your fears head-on in The Walking Dead Onslaught, the official VR game of AMC’s The Walking Dead. From AMC and Survios, the studio behind top-selling VR titles Raw Data and Creed: Rise to Glory, The Walking Dead Onslaught invites players to assume the roles of their favorite survivors from the TV series, struggling against the relentless walker threat while confronting both the horrors and humanity of this apocalyptic world. 

Creeping to Virtual Reality 2020.
